features: Moisturizing Aloe Vera Formula: Our formula includes organic Aloe Vera which replaces H2O
body.description: Improve your hair's strength and health with PURA D’OR Deep Moisturizing Conditioner. Dry scalp most commonly causes breakage, damaged and frizzy hair because there is not enough moisture. This is why hydrating the scalp and locking in moisture to the hair and follicles is essential to maintaining strong, healthy hair. Environmental factors such as weather and pollution can cause the hair to be stripped of moisture and lose the nutrients it needs. To help repair the hair, our blend of botanical ingredients including Argan Oil, Apple Extracts, and Pumpkin Seed Extract to rejuvenate the hair. When combined in our formula, they support and promote healthy scalp, fuller volume, thicker hair, while reducing tangles and frizz. PURA D'OR Deep Moisturizing Conditioner is free from harsh ingredients including sulfate, paraben, and artificial additives. It is cruelty-free, hypoallergenic and manufactured in our U.S. facility where we use renewable solar energy sources.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Moisturizing Biotin Conditioner About PURA D'OR PURA D’OR is driven by desire to provide superior solutions to your toughest beauty and personal care problems. Experience nature and purity in every formula with the combination of select natural ingredients, premium oils, and our naturally-based preservative system. Manufactured in sunny Southern California, PURA D’OR is dedicated in providing sustainable and friendly products that uses renewable energy and recyclable packaging. Deep Moisturizing Biotin Conditioner A blend of naturally moisturizing oils Scalp hydration helps lock in moisture to hair and follicles is essential to maintaining strong, healthy hair. The blend of botanical ingredients we use in PURA D'OR Deep Moisturizing Biotin Conditioner includes Argan Oil, Apple Extracts, and Pumpkin Seed Extract to rejuvenate the hair. Crafted with Care PURA D’OR products are crafted from hand-selected ingredients in strict adherence to our Promise List. Carefully formulated and bottled in our U.S. facility under our strict quality control.

Rare, Exotic Ingredients We focus on providing the most natural, most plant-based products. We use hand-selected rare botanical ingredients that are imported from different parts of the world to give you the highest quality. Purity in Every Bottle We take pride in using ingredients that are friendlier on the scalp and friendlier on the environment. All of our products are free from sulfates, parabens, silicones, and other artificial additives. Cruelty-Free Our products are not just harsh-free and Vegan-friendly, but it is also cruelty-free. Our products are not tested on animals. No third-party testings. In-House Manufacturing Our products are manufactured in our U.S. facility with adherence to our strict quality control system to meet and exceed industry and government standards.

Improve your hair's strength and health with PURA D’OR Deep Moisturizing Conditioner. Dry scalp most commonly causes breakage, damaged, and frizzy hair because there is not enough moisture. Works best in synergy with the Original Gold Label Anti-Thinning Shampoo or the Maximum Defense Shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have thinner wavy hair, on the dry side, and a sensitive scalp.I had never tried this before but really like it. You hair feels so soft and silky after you use it and it doesn't irritate my scalp which was important. I have only used it a few times but so far so good. I am waiting to try the shampoo which goes with it. The scent is nice and not irritating to allergies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, detangled hair. Worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Pura D'OR Gold anti-hair loss shampoo and the regular conditioner for over a year now. I am very impressed with the quality and effectiveness of the products so I decided to give this deep moisturizing conditioner a try. First, it smells awesome and immediately detangled my hair in the shower. It rinsed out easily and left wet hair smooth and easy to comb through. After blow drying, my hair had life again. The conditioner seemed to bring back some of the shine that had been missing. My hair had body and was not weighed down at all. About my hair: I have more than a few gray hairs which are colored with a semi-permanent hair color. My hair has become dry from the lack of humidity in our Northeast Winter air (also forced hot air heating). My hair color was drab as it needs redoing. In the past few years, I have struggled with thinning hair due to menopause. I have found that using the PURA D'OR line of hair products for anti-hair loss has helped a lot. I am posting a picture I took today. My hair looked like this after a day of errand running. I loved that it had lots of body, a beachy look and STILL HAD SHINE. I recommend this product for daily use to anyone who had normal to dry hair. If you have oily hair and dry ends then it would really help smooth those ends out and bring some color enhancement to your hair. I have also added another picture take the day after with a smoother look so you could see the shine better. Please do pair it with one of the anti-hair loss shampoos. The LAST PICTURE is where I STARTED with my hair loss recovery journey over 15 months ago. In depth reviews are on the Pura D'OR Gold shampoo listing. The products need to be used together for at least three months.If this review has been helpful to you please press the "helpful" button. Also, if I can answer any question about the this conditioner just send me a message. I have left reviews for the other Pura D'OR products I have used (gold shampoo and organic conditioner). I have additional pictures there of my hair loss recovery journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it so much I got two more after the first one was gone. It made my hair feel nice and soft 😌. I have medium thick hair and its to the middle of my back that its a dirty blonde color. So idk how well it works for other hair but for mine it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will this save my hair? Highly doubtful. But...
reviews.reviewText: I'm experiencing continued and unexplained hair shed. I'm not old enough to be dealing with this and washing my hair has become something I absolutely dread, but it is what it is. Like everyone, I took to Amazon and the web to find a solution and the solution is, basically, Rogaine. My derm confirmed this, didn't even blink. (Do your research, however - everything has a side effect and a catch).Topical Biotin is generally not going to help the cause of hair loss - there's little science behind that idea (and technically, you're really only supposed to put conditioner on your mid-lengths to avoid oily roots later, so scalp contact should be minimal). Most often the issue needs to be treated from the inside because the inside and for temporary effects there's the Rogaines of the world. There's some study(ies?) coming out that say MELATONIN could be something to look into but it hasn't been studied enough for hair loss (and it's a hormone, yikes). Check out Dr. Dray's videos on this topic on Youtube.I won't be here to add to the hope that this product will solve your problems because it has not solved mine - I bought it knowing it wouldn't but I liked the ingredient list (if it made a real difference for you, though, bravo).I really like this conditioner for it's basic properties - it's thick but light, very rich texture without being oily or heavy. It feels....expensive. So, as much as I dread washing my hair now, I definitely look forward to using this after my shampoo because Nizoral feels like it strips alllll the moisture from your hair. I put this on and clip my hair up while I shower to let it do its thing. I have shiny, smooth hair after - at least something I can enjoy in the midst of all this! This review was kind of anticlimactic, even for me lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is the best conditioner i have found for very fine thin hair
reviews.reviewText: I have tried dozens of conditioners to improve the strength and texture of my very fine fragile hair. This is the only product that has made a difference; hair is stronger and is not dried outWould recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for detangling
reviews.reviewText: Might be my new favorite conditioner. It makes detangling so much easier which says a lot because I have long hair with very thick curls, and it can be unruly at times. This conditioner has the perfect slip to it to combat the wash day struggle lol it’s very hydrating and also smells lovely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars bleached blond hair
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is the BEST! After first application I noticed a huge difference in the feel of my hair, soft and looks great..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to get out of bottle
reviews.reviewText: The pump would not unscrew to pump so I twisted off the top. Too thick Hard to get out of bottle. PLUS SIDE Very nice fragrance. Conditioner needs to have a thinner consistency.
Bottle was not sealed/ packed properly and a good amount of product is leaked. Not expected from an expensive product .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 11, 2022

reviews.reviewText: Have been using this product for a number of years. Recently went to buy it again but it was sold out so I was forced to buy PURA D'OR Apple Cider Vinegar THIN2THICK with BIOTIN,CASTOR OIL & Proprietary Herbal Blend Shampoo and Conditioner. That just didn't go well at all with my hair. Found this product was back in stock and immediately purchased it. The difference in my hair after just 2-3 days was incredible. For me, this is the best shampoo and conditioner out there. It is a little pricey, but it is worth it. Absolutely recommend it. (I hair fine hair that was thinning quickly. This product has drastically reduced the thinning.)
Suaviza el cabello, huele muy bien , después de usarlo mi pelo parecia mas hidratado , me gusta mucho que no lleve siliconas!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived on time and is a great product
reviews.reviewText: I like the Pura D'Or Biotin Conditioner and use it constantly. It softens and moisturizes my hair.
